snippet: Gary Gensler, who is overhauling an array of financial rules as head of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, cracked several ribs on Sunday when he fell at his Maryland home.
abstract: Gary Gensler, who is overhauling an array of financial rules as head of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, cracked several ribs on Sunday when he fell at his Maryland home.

headline.main: With Gensler in Hospital, Agency Scraps Public Vote

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
